item.description:
Time for our monthly "Girl's Night"!

So what are we going to do this this Girl's Night?! Whatever we decide! I'm hoping we'll have a theme for every month, and rotate to each others houses or to different locales. It'll be a great way to get out, make new friends, and have something to look forward to each month.

At the meeting, we will choose the date for the next Girl's Night, the location, the host, and the theme!

This Month's Girl's Night:
1. Date: Saturday, March 12th at 5pm
2. Location: Rachel's House in Yarmouth (Address to be emailed out 1 week in advance)
3. Host: Rachel
4. Theme: A Night on the Irish Isle

This Girl's Night will involve all things related to the green isle of Ireland. It is, after all, the month of Irish Merriment and festivities! Where green or the good ole Rachel's Restaurant & Pub may be closed for business and not let you in.

Recipes for food listed below can be found at: http://www.foodbycountry.com/Germany-to-Japan/Ireland.html

Recipes for all drinks listed below can be found at: http://www.irishcultureandcustoms.com/2kitch/XmasDrinks2.html

Please sign up to bring one of the following by adding a comment when you RSVP:

1. Traditional Irish Stew

2. Irish Soda Bread

3. Corned Beef with Cabbage
4. Champ (Food)
5. Barm Brack (Food)
6. Irish Christmas Cake
7. Scones
8. Apple Cake
9. Guinness Beer
10. Mulled Wine (Drink)

11. Home Made Irish Cider (Drink)
12. Black Velvet (Drink)
13. Skittles (So we can taste the rainbow!)
14. Leprechaun Gold (Chocolate Candies wrapped in gold foil - It disappears within 24 hours of finding it, so spend it quick!)
15. Green Leis - 20 (http://www.partypro.com/party-supplies/st-patricks-day/st-patricks-stuff-i-can-wear/st-patricks-leis-boas-sashes/leis-1-12-in-green.html)
16. Something Irish of your choosing (Please specify what you will be bringing)
17. Something Irish of your choosing (Please specify what you will be bringing)
18. Something Irish of your choosing (Please specify what you will be bringing)

Our goal is to spend $20 or less for each item.

I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Rachel will be answering the door - Address will be emailed out one week in advance
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: A Night on the Irish Isle!
